ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Newbie Here
ygData.msgSnippet: A little info... what class is she? (Magician, Wizard, Druid... ) and what  level? Casters start out with 2 spells, they are in your inventory. You have to
ygData.messageBody:
A little info... what class is she? (Magician, Wizard, Druid... ) and what  level? Casters start out with 2 spells, they are in your inventory. You have to scribe them in your spell book, then "memorize" them by putting the spells into the spell slots (it's that box with 8 little holes in it). Then to cast, you click on the memorized spell icon.

I hope this wasn't TOO basic, hehe... let us know if you need more help. :)

Nadenu Willowmist, Druid of Tholuxe Paells

 jesus4metx@... wrote:

Hi everyone.  I just got the game Everquest and am so confused!  I read through the manual and can get around but how do you cast spells, talk to people around you, etc.??  I'm about to give up lol.  I'd tell you my characters name but I can't remember. :)  She is in the first world though.  Thanks ahead of time for any advice/help you can give me!
Keri
